attributes.action: require the owners and/or effective controllers of major media such as television stations and national newspapers to be full UK citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much of our broadcast and print media are in the hands of foreign owned or managed companies. This allows undue, possibly malign, foreign influence over what is printed and broadcast in the UK. The USA have such a rule to prevent undue foreign influence in their media. Why can't we?
